Game.Name: Super Rugby (Japan)
Game.plot: Super Rugby is a Rugby game, developed and published by TSS, which was released in Japan in 1989.http://www.gamefaqs.com/console/nes/home/579537.htmlCheat: Go to Final MatchEnter "TESSUE" as the team name and you'll begin at the final match with the "BLACKS" team - your team will be named "ZURU". Additionally, the person "TESSUE MAN KOIE" will be mentioned now in the Special Thanks portion of the credits.
Game.Notes: Super Rugby is a Sports game, developed by Zap and published by TSS, which was released in Japan in 1989.
